definition.text: Brazil is a federal presidential republic in South America and the largest country in both area and population in the region. It possesses a diversified economy spanning agriculture, mining, manufacturing, and services, and plays a central geopolitical and ecological role due to the Amazon rainforest and its membership in major multilateral groupings.
